Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:

public class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
ClientHandler uses by the thread for handel the client for all the game

Gaspare Mascolino

    • looseCondition

      public static void looseCondition​(int workerindex1, int workerindex2) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Check if a player looses for "can't move" "can't build" "Chrous power" In a 3 players game, the looser player become a viewer of the game which goes on In a 2 players game, call win condition method
      Parameters:
      workerindex1 - index of worker 1
      workerindex2 - index of worker 2
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - for input or output exception
      java.lang.InterruptedException - for interupted exception
